description: Extract and analyze data from PDF documents. This plugin leverages the pdf-parse Node.js library to parse PDF files, retrieving both the text content and metadata information. It is ideal for applications that require processing and analysis of PDF documents, including those that implement vectorization techniques for Language Learning Models (LLM).
name: PDF Parser
plugin_instructions:
- Select the "pdf-parser" action in your workflow.
- Provide the URL of the PDF you want to parse.
